meanings.definition: Forming a crust or crust-like layer
meanings.sent1: The crustose rocks were hard and flat.
meanings.sent2: The bread had a crustose outer layer.
meanings.sent3: The crustose cookies were so crunchy, they sounded like rocks.
meanings.sent4: His crustose personality made it hard to get close to him.
meanings.sent5: The crustose bark on the tree felt rough to the touch.

meanings.definition: Having a crust-like appearance or texture
meanings.sent1: The crustose surface looked bumpy and rough.
meanings.sent2: The old painting had a crustose layer of dust on it.
meanings.sent3: The crustose pizza crust was burnt to a crisp.
meanings.sent4: Her crustose skin felt like sandpaper.
meanings.sent5: The crustose ground felt hard under my feet.

meanings.sent1: The crustose lichen spread slowly across the rock.
meanings.sent2: The moss had a crustose growth pattern on the tree trunk.
meanings.sent3: The crustose vines climbed the wall like tiny soldiers.
meanings.sent4: The crustose plants covered the ground like a patchwork quilt.
meanings.sent5: The crustose algae formed a colorful layer on the ocean floor.
